prompt: <description>Part 1: Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a sloped side. Begin by creating a new coordinate system at (0, 0.022, 0) with euler angles (0, 0, 0). Next, create a sketch on face 1 of the coordinate system. Create loop 1 and add line 1 from (0, 0) to (0.75, 0), line 2 from (0.75, 0) to (0.75, 0.3878), line 3 from (0.75, 0.3878) to (0, 0.3878), and line 4 from (0, 0.3878) to (0, 0). This will create a rectangle with vertices at (0, 0), (0.75, 0), (0.75, 0.3878), and (0, 0.3878). Extrude the sketch by 0.1182 towards the normal and 0 towards the opposite direction of the normal. Set the sketch scale to 0.75. This will create a rectangular prism with flat top and bottom that is slightly tapered in the middle. Part 2: Construct a rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system at (0.6973, 0.022, 0.0211) with euler angles (0, 0, -90). Next, create a sketch on face 1 of the coordinate system. Create loop 1 and add line 1 from (0, 0) to (0.0366, 0), line 2 from (0.0366, 0) to (0.0366, 0.0563), line 3 from (0.0366, 0.0563) to (0, 0.0563), and line 4 from (0, 0.0563) to (0, 0). This will create a rectangle with vertices at (0, 0), (0.0366, 0), (0.0366, 0.0563), and (0, 0.0563). Extrude the sketch by 0.022 towards the normal and 0 towards the opposite direction of the normal. Set the sketch scale to 0.0563. This will create a rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. Part 3: Construct a cylindrical object with two parallel cylinders connected by a smaller cylinder in the middle. Begin by creating a new coordinate system at (0.7499, 0.4098, 0.0385) with euler angles (180, 0, -90). Next, create a sketch on face 1 of the coordinate system. Create loop 1 and add circle 1 with center at (0.0102, 0.0102) and radius of 0.0102. Create a second loop on face 2 and add circle 2 with center at (0.0102, 0.0309) and radius of 0.0102. Extrude both sketches by 0.1463 towards the normal and 0 towards the opposite direction of the normal. Set the sketch scale to 0.0411. This will create a cylindrical object with two parallel cylinders connected by a smaller cylinder in the middle. The cylindrical object is symmetrical and has a smooth surface. Final Shape: The final shape is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section. The prism is 0.75 units in length, 0.75 units in width, and 0.1182 units in height. The tapered middle section is 0.0563 units thick and has a 45 degree angle. The overall shape is symmetrical and has a smooth surface.</description>
